content:
Penn State wrestler Eric Bradley grapples with a Michigan State wrestler in a 184pound match earlier this season PERIOD

Advertisement

The Penn State wrestling team will travel to Ohio State this weekend to perform a psychology experiment  the falsification of the phenomenon of dj vu PERIOD

Exactly  days ago the Nittany Lions were in an almost identical situation looking to secure a . winning percentage in the Big Ten with the team standing in their path being Ohio State a team that like last year is winless in the conference PERIOD

Penn State   Big Ten will try to avenge a loss in last years final dual match a  loss to Ohio State at the Bryce Jordan Center with a road victory at  tonight at St PERIOD John Arena in Columbus PERIOD

Wrestling at Ohio State  tonight St PERIOD John Arena

It was at this point last season that Penn State coach Troy Sunderland was telling his men not to take Ohio State   Big Ten lightly not to look at their record and not to try to cruise into the Big Ten Championships PERIOD This year he has approached the team with the same philosophy but with last years demoralizing loss to back up his claims PERIOD

 senior captain Eric Bradley said PERIOD 

 senior Dewitt Driscoll said PERIOD 

After the matchup against Ohio State Penn State will follow up with a noon match on Sunday at Indianapolis Conseco Fieldhouse against Purdue a neutral site an hourandahalf away from the Purdue campus in West Lafayette Ind PERIOD The match will serve as an intermission during the Indiana high school state wrestling championships PERIOD

Purdue   Big Ten has fallen on and off the national radar but currently is on the outside of the top  PERIOD

Several intriguing matchups will take place including the Boilermakers 133pound veteran No PERIOD  Chris Fleeger versus rising freshman No PERIOD  Jake Strayer PERIOD No PERIOD  Phil Davis is coming off one of his best performances of his Penn State career and will battle No PERIOD  Nathan Moore of Purdue PERIOD

The feature matchup is the battle at  where Penn States fallen hero No PERIOD  Bradley will get a chance to redeem himself from his first loss two weeks ago PERIOD He will battle No PERIOD  Ben Wissel in a match of competitors that have faced off four times in their history in the Big Ten PERIOD

 Bradley said PERIOD 

Bradley said he doesnt get caught up in the rankings but knows he dropped from No PERIOD  after his defeat at Iowa State PERIOD

 he said PERIOD

Injury notes

Senior captain James Woodall will not wrestle this weekend because of a skin disorder PERIOD James Lapham will take his place at  PERIOD

 Lapham said PERIOD 

No PERIOD  James Yonushonis will return to the  spot after taking a week off to rest an injured knee PERIOD
